ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] New patch message
ygData.msgSnippet: Well if I was writing up a message to send out to the User community I sure would take the 30 seconds to find out.  I do that weekly currently.  I think my
ygData.messageBody:
Well if I was writing up a message to send out to the User community I sure
would take the 30 seconds to find out. I do that weekly currently. I think
my Users would be pretty disgusted to if I put out a Users change
notification that said:

"That fund program you were using for transfer on those tech things
is no longer
showing credits that should be debits"

I don't think it's too much to ask for a little professionalism.

It's Tarew's Aquatic Ayre btw, and no I did not have to look it up. I'm
pretty sure the other is just Anthem de Arms, but give me 30 seconds and I
can be sure, less if I had a spell database locally.

Kit


How many of our bards could tell you off the top of their head the name of
their songs?
I can't tell you what the exact name of Faesong's underwater breath song is.
I'm not
even quite sure what the full name of "Anthem" is without looking it up.

There are quite enough things to get upset at Verant about without
stretching to come up with more.

Sarah Heacock sarah@...
Meara Daring, level 26 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faerain Wanderer, level 20 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faesong, level 17 HalfElf Bard of Solusek Ro, Phoenix, Solusek Ro (Qeynos) /
Jidranth, lvl 6 Iskar Warrior, Solusek Ro /

>Subject: RE: [eqbards] New patch message
>
>
>But remember as Abashi said, and he writes these things now supposedly,
>"there are several Verant people who have high level bards that he consults
>regularly when bard issues come up."
>
>Course, they probably "just play mana song" for the casters that hold the
>real power.
>
> Kit
>
>
>LOL i didn't think of that, but funny =)
>
>Shada
>
>> Am I the only one that is upset that they can't even take 2
>> seconds to hit
>> Rokenn's Site and look up the name of the goddamned song?
>>
>> Draelon
